overview: Over the Horizon takes its name from the failed radar system developed on Orford Ness in Suffolk during the Cold War. The building that housed it and its ariel field are now used to broadcast the BBC World Service to Europe. The film revisits the site of a previous film Cobra Mist (2008) and explores through photographs and sound the memory of a place, the remnants of history and evidence of stories true or rumored.
title: Over the Horizon
